name: RTX 9™
description: RTX 9™ is truly all-purpose. That means you don’t need a separate floor cleaner, toilet bowl cleaner, child seat cleaner - RTX-9™ can replace 11 different products that you don’t need to stock.RTX-9 all-purpose cleaner-degreaser has the power to replace 11 different products. No longer do you need a separate floor cleaner, toilet bowl cleaner, child seat cleaner: RTX-9 does it all. From automotive interiors to exteriors, cleaning the floor of the auto bay to cleaning the countertop in the public restroom, this product delivers. Simplify your supplies; rely on RTX-9 to do it all. The power behind RTX-9 is what makes it our flagship product. It was engineered specifically to meet the maximum-cleaning power requirements of Hertz, while at the same time being 100% work safe and environmentally friendly.
